类 SearchTest

java.lang.Object
test.SearchTest
@ExtendWith(org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationExtension.class) public class SearchTest extends Object
Test class for search functionality validation in the recipe selection interface. This class tests search input validation, including valid inputs, overlength inputs, and empty inputs using JavaFX TestFX framework.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法详细资料

    • start

      @Start public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes the JavaFX environment for testing.
      参数:
      stage - test stage provided by ApplicationExtension

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Prepares test environment before each test execution.
      • Clears search input field
      • Resets alert tracking

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      Cleans up test environment after each test execution.
      • Resets alert tracking

    • testValidTextInput_Tomato

      @Test public void testValidTextInput_Tomato()
      Test Case 1: Valid search term input (EC V1).

      Input: "tomato" Expected: No alert shown

    • testLongTextInput

      @Test public void testLongTextInput()
      Test Case 2: Overlength search term input (EC V2).

      Input: "averylongIngredientNamewhichexceeds30characters" Expected: Alert shown

    • testEmptyTextInput

      @Test public void testEmptyTextInput()
      Test Case 3: Empty input (EC V3).

      Input: "" (represents null) Expected: Alert shown
